docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 29--The government today published a decree setting up a commission of high ranking army officers to draw up plans for the air base to be constructed near fashionable Carrasco Beach.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 29--The government today published a decree setting up a commission of high ranking army officers to draw up plans for the air base to be constructed near fashionable Carrasco Beach.
docs.abstract: Pro-Fascist delegation from Argentina to honor L A Herrera for opposing Baldomir plans for continental defense

headline.main: URUGUAY SETS UP BOARD FOR AIR BASE; Decree Creates a Commission of High Ranking Officers to Draw Necessary Plans PART OF DEFENSE SCHEME Costa Rica Supports Project for Hemisphere--Salvador Will Also Cooperate
